entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 25 except 19 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 25 except 19 near Lake Erie. Humidex 28. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
